text: World Trade Center is a 2006 American survival disaster drama movie directed by Oliver Stone. It is based on the September 11, 2001 attacks at the World Trade Center. It stars Nicolas Cage, Maria Bello, Michael Pe√±a, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Stephen Dorff and Michael Shannon. The movie was shot between October 2005 & February 2006. It was released on August 9, 2006. The movie had mixed critical reviews although it made $163 million in the box office. ==References== Category:2006 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies based on the September 11 attacks Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Movies directed by Oliver Stone Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: World Trade Center (movie)
